messages.content: Write 3 concise bullets on why streaming responses are useful for UX.

outputs.text:
- **Instant feedback**: Users see first tokens in <1 s, cutting perceived wait time and abandonment.  
- **Progressive rendering**: Content unfolds line-by-line, letting users read, scroll, or cancel early if irrelevant.  
- **Back-pressure relief**: Long generations stream without locking the UI or hitting timeout walls, keeping the app responsive.
